----
+++ General
The WikidPad syntax is based on a set of regular expressions. It can be customized by creating a custom "wikisyntax.py" file. To do so, copy the existing file: 
	* [ProgramFiles |wikidpad / extensions / wikisyntax.py] to 
	* [ProgramFiles |wikidpad / user_extensions / wikisyntax.py];
create the directory if it doesn't exist.
Then edit [ProgramFiles |user_extensions / wikisyntax.py] with a standard text editor to override the default syntax specification. This file will not be touched when upgrading wikidPad.
